## ThirdwebAuthConfig.authUrl property

The backend URL of the authentication endoints. For example, if your endpoints are at /api/auth/login, /api/auth/logout, etc. then this should be set to "/api/auth".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
authUrl: string;
```
